data.name: Frontline Survivors
data.activityDesc:
Welcome to Frontline Survivors!
In this mode, the deployed Doll will shoot automatically. You only need to control her movement.
By eliminating enemy units, you gain Survivor Points and Experience, which allows you to level up after accumulating enough. Upon leveling up, you can choose a battlefield buff out of a random selection.

data.name: Frontline Survivors - Season 2
data.activityDesc:
Welcome to Frontline Survivors - Season 2!
In this mode, the deployed Doll will shoot automatically. You only need to control her movement.
By eliminating enemy units, you gain Survivor Points and Experience, which allows you to level up after accumulating enough. Upon leveling up, you can choose a battlefield buff out of a random selection.

data.name: Frostfire Leap
data.activityDesc:
Welcome to Frostfire Leap!
In this mode, you can control your character to jump, dash, and reverse gravity to maneuver and avoid attacks. You can also utilize the interaction between the elements of ice and fire to deal with special terrain.
Try to reach the finish line as fast as you can!

data.name: Operation Ruin Flight
data.activityDesc:
Welcome to Operation Ruin Flight!
This fully functional Super Dinergate doesn't belong here. Control it to jump upwards and out of the ruins!

data.name: Operation Ruin Flight - Season 2
data.activityDesc:
Welcome to Operation Ruin Flight!
This fully functional Super Dinergate doesn't belong here. Control it to jump upwards and out of the ruins!
